item.title: New Beginnings
item.description: This is my first blog. I am planning to write some simple blogposts on some frontend and travel stuffs. I have used gatsby to build thisâ€¦
item.content:encoded: This is my first blog. I am planning to write some simple blogposts on some frontend and travel stuffs. I have used gatsby to build this site, which was super easy. Will write a detailed post on how to get started with gatsby and make a simple blog, almost for free.
